title: Workshop on Computer Technology Integration Design for Engineering Education

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental engineering theories and practical experience, understanding of social systems
context.additional_context: Engineering education design course conducted in smartphone-based constrained technology environments, with industry-linked projects for corporate learners.

learning_goals: Explain strategies for utilizing learning innovation technologies (e.g., simulation tools) and domain-specific computational tools (e.g., CAD software) required for engineering problem-solving
Design collaborative processes for team-based project execution in smartphone-based technological environments
Propose technology integration solutions for engineering problem-solving linked to societal contexts

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
